title: CRISTAL COVABEAD - Sensient Beauty
description: COVABEAD CRYSTAL son perlas esféricas químicamente inertes con excelentes propiedades de difusión de la luz. Esta propiedad se aprovecha para trabajar en sinergia con filtros UV minerales y orgánicos con el fin de potenciar su eficacia y...
text:
This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.
INCI
Calcium Sodium Borosilicate
Categorías
Sensory Powders
Disponibilidad regional
APAC, EMEA, GLOBAL, LATAM, NORTH AMERICA
Aplicaciones
Eye, Face, Hair Color, Lip, Makeup, Skincare, Suncare
Certificaciones
Ventajas técnicas
Light reflection properties
SPF Booster
Low water and oil absorption, no impact on viscosity in formulations
Covabead Crystal is made of highly engineered spheres from Canby, Oregon. The microspheres are recycled from the “cleanest” and “clearest” Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, contributing to sustainability.
Beneficios cosméticos
Blurring effect
Soft and creamy skin feel
Blue Light protection
Acceda a su cuenta de MySensient para ver la información reglamentaria de este producto
"*" indicates required fields
